Title: Relates to the personal information of a credit or debit card holder
Summary: Relates to the personal information of a credit or debit card holder; adds zip code, e-mail address and home, cell and work telephone numbers to the personal information protected.
LawCode: Amd ยง520-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the personal information of a credit or debit card holder
